description: Historical record of ECU table and parameter changes

symptoms: Sound appears to come from mid/rear of car near transmission tunnel
1135 knock events at idle in datalog (likely false knock from same issue)
mechanical_issues.suspected_cause: Exhaust leak - turbo→downpipe, headers, or mid-pipe connection
mechanical_issues.actual_cause: Loose/missing header bolts at turbo header flange
diagnostic_notes: Knock pattern: idle-only with DAM=1.0 and FKL=0° = false knock signature
Poof under acceleration suggests boost pressure escaping through gap
User ruled out mechanical contact with pulleys/flywheel
Sound location suggests front-pipe, cat, or mid-pipe connection

inspection_checklist.item: Look for black soot streaks at joints

resolution.repair: Header bolts tightened, missing bolt replaced
resolution.notes: First shop (exhaust shop) found issue but left headlight ballast disconnected causing false alarm on second visit. 5J's completed proper repair.

follow_up.action: Capture new datalog after exhaust repair
follow_up.expected_outcome: Knock events should drop to near-zero
